official_title: Requiring the National Science Foundation to submit to the Congress a report concerning science and mathematics education and career potential for the underprivileged.
short_title: Math and Science Careers Act of 1989

summary.text: Math and Science Careers Act of 1989 - Requires the National Science Foundation to submit to the Congress by February 1, 1990, a report on science and mathematics education and career potential for the underprivileged.

titles.title: Math and Science Careers Act of 1989
Requiring the National Science Foundation to submit to the Congress a report concerning science and mathematics education and career potential for the underprivileged.
